# b00tl3gRSA2

## Descripcion
In RSA d is a lot bigger than e, why don't we use d to encrypt instead of e? Connect with `nc jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org 19566`.

## Pistas
- What is e generally?

## SoluciÃ³n

### Descarga de archivos
```
eltetor14-picoctf@webshell:~$ nc jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org 19566
c: 
n: 
e: 
```

### Python
```
C:\Users\hectr\Segu\notas-hacking>python
Python 3.8.10 (tags/v3.8.10:3d8993a, May  3 2021, 11:48:03) [MSC v.1928 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> 
>>> 
>>> 
>>> e=65537
>>> m=pow(c,d,n)
>>> from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes
>>> long_to_bytes(m)
b'=\xca\xd5\x91\x97g\x85A\xbe\x83/?\xa0#\xb8\n\xfd\xb4\x9dYf\xdc\xb1+\xca\xe3\xfe\xcc\x08\x89\xf7\xbfi\xc05\xa7\xd0\xd6\xf9\x047\xc5\xd4\xa5-R\xe7\xe0\xeb\xf2\xf3\x0fr\x908\xfe|\xce\xa9\xdc\xa9K\xf1\x8a^\xd2\xbc\xe9\xfe\x9d\xb4\x1cJr\xe9\x1a\xbd\xbe\xabk\x9c4\xba\xf4\xc1b\xa2\x9c\x1fz\x99\xcd\x9e\xedyP\x1f@T\x05\xfeV+\xa6\xb4%\x98\xef\x8b\xa8\xa7}\xc7\x1d\xd1Q\x7f\xc0\x94+\xdf\xed\xd6\xacB\xc1\x06\xf5'
>>> m=pow(c,e,n)
>>> long_to_bytes(m)
b'picoCTF{bad_1d3a5_2438125}'
>>>
```

## Bandera
picoCTF{bad_1d3a5_2438125}
